name: Development Workflow
description: Guide for developing and enhancing DecisionTreeTool

7ef0c839.question: Is this a new feature request?

ef3e25c0.question: Plan feature implementation
ef3e25c0.action: Write requirements, design API, create examples

3c360d6f.question: Reproduce and diagnose bug
3c360d6f.action: Create test case, identify root cause, plan fix

aa7fd614.question: Update documentation
aa7fd614.action: Update README, add examples, document API changes

411665fc.question: Run tests and validate
411665fc.action: Test all formats, validate examples, check edge cases

0751bb15.question: Commit and push changes
0751bb15.action: git add, commit with clear message, push to GitHub
